title: Review Player Misconduct for Disciplinary Action
description: A player received a red card for a dangerous tackle. The league's disciplinary committee must review the incident to determine the length of the suspension.

tasks.description: Retrieve the official referee's report and video of the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the primary evidence for the case.

tasks.description: Check the league's disciplinary code for precedents involving similar offenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that similar tackles have typically resulted in a 3-game suspension.

tasks.description: Based on the evidence and precedents, issue a 3-game suspension to the player.
Notify the player's team of the disciplinary action.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal notification to the team.
